context.speaker: Sara
context.en_line: Hello, Ali. My name is Sara.

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: We are students. They are teachers.

strings.value: Bu mening otam. Uning ismi Omar.

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: This is my father. His name is Omar.

strings.value: Bu mening onam. Uning ismi Laylo.

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: This is my mother. Her name is Laylo.

strings.value: Bu mening akam va mening singlim.

context.speaker: Vali
context.en_line: This is my brother and my sister.

strings.value: 'Hello' har doim gapning BOSHIDA keladi — uchrashgandagi salomlashish.
'Hello' تأتي دائماً في بداية الجملة — تحية عند اللقاء.
Yo'q. 'Hello' gapning BOSHIDA, salomlashish uchun ishlatiladi.
لا. 'Hello' تأتي في بداية الجملة، للتحية.
Gapning boshida — salomlashish (At the beginning — greeting)
Gapning oxirida — xayrlashish (At the end — farewell)
Do'stingizga ingliz tilida salom ayting va ismingizni ayting.
'My' = MENING (egalik). Ism/narsa oldidan keladi: MY name, MY book.
'My' = لي (ملكية). تأتي قبل الاسم: MY name, MY book.
'My' = MENING. 'Me' = MENI. Ism oldidan doim 'MY' kerak.
Ingliz tilida ayting: Mening ismim [your name].
Oilangiz haqida bir gap ayting: Mening ... (my ...)
Yo'q. 'Name' = ISM. Bu harakat emas, shaxsni aniqlash.
لا. 'Name' = اسم. ليس فعلاً، بل تحديد هوية.
'Name' = ISM (ot). 'My name is...' — shaxsni aniqlash uchun ishlatiladi.
'Name' = اسم. 'My name is...' — يستخدم لتحديد الهوية.
'Name' = ISM (ot). Bu harakat emas, shaxsni aniqlash uchun.
'Name' = اسم. ليس فعلاً، بل لتحديد الهوية.
Sinfdoshingiz haqida gap ayting: U ... (He/She is ...)
'I' har doim 'AM' bilan keladi. I AM = Men ...man.
O'zingiz haqida ingliz tilida bir gap ayting: I am ...
To'g'ri! 'AM' faqat 'I' bilan. I AM = Men ...man.
صحيح! 'AM' فقط مع 'I'. I AM = أنا...
'Am' FAQAT 'I' bilan. He = is, You/We/They = are.
'Am' فقط مع 'I'. He = is، You/We/They = are.
O'zingiz haqida ayting — kasbingiz yoki holatingiz: I am ...
Ingliz tilida kasb/rol oldidan 'A' artikli kerak: a student, a teacher.
في الإنجليزية يلزم 'A' قبل المهنة: a student, a teacher.
Ingliz tilida kasb oldidan 'A' artikli SHART: I am A student.
في الإنجليزية 'A' ضروري قبل المهنة: I am A student.
⚠️ 'A' artikli kerak! 'I am A student' to'g'ri.
Siz talabamisiz yoki o'qituvchimisiz? Ingliz tilida javob bering.
To'g'ri! 'Nice to meet you' = birinchi tanishuv.
صحيح! 'Nice to meet you' = عند اللقاء الأول.
Yo'q. 'Nice to meet you' = BIRINCHI marta tanishganda.
لا. 'Nice to meet you' = عند اللقاء الأول فقط.
'Nice to meet you' — bu iboraning tarkibini ko'ring.
انظر إلى تركيب 'Nice to meet you'.
'Nice to meet you' = birinchi marta uchrashgandagi RASMIY salom.
'Nice to meet you' = تحية رسمية عند اللقاء الأول.
Bu maqtash emas! 'Nice to meet you' = tanishish salomlashishi.
ليس مدحاً! 'Nice to meet you' = تحية عند التعارف.
Yangi do'stingizga salomlashing: Nice to meet you, [ism]!

context.en_canonical: No, but I want to meet her.
No, but I want to meet her.

strings.value: Kim bilan tanishmoqchisiz? I want to meet ...
'You' — birlik va ko'plik uchun bir xil-mi?
Ingliz tilida 'you' = siz/sen/sizlar — hammasi bir xil!
'You' birlik HAM ko'plik HAM uchun ishlatiladi.
Oilangiz haqida ayting: We are ... / They are ...
Ingliz tilida kasb aytganda 'A' artikli SHART: a teacher, a student.
في الإنجليزية 'A' ضروري قبل المهنة: a teacher, a student.
Kasb oldidan 'A' kerak: He is A teacher.
'A' ضروري قبل المهنة: He is A teacher.
⚠️ 'A' artikli kerak! 'He is A teacher' to'g'ri.
O'qituvchingiz haqida gap ayting: He/She is a teacher.
Sinfdagi bir erkak o'quvchi haqida gap ayting: He is ...
'She' = هي (أنثى). عند الحديث عن أنثى استخدم 'she'.
Sinfdagi bir qiz o'quvchi haqida gap ayting: She is ...
Ingliz tilida so'rang: Sizning ismingiz nima?
Do'stingizga savol bering: What is your ...?
Siz va do'stlaringiz haqida ayting: We are ...
'They' = ULAR (uchinchi shaxs ko'plik). Gapiruvchi ichida EMAS.
'They' = هم (الشخص الثالث جمع). المتحدث غير مشمول.
'They' = boshqa odamlar. Gapiruvchi ichida bo'lsa 'we' ishlatiladi.
'They' = أشخاص آخرون. إذا كان المتحدث مشمولاً نستخدم 'we'.
'Father' so'zini qaysi egalik so'zi bilan ishlatamiz?
Oila a'zolari oldidan egalik so'zi kerak: MY father, HIS father.
Ingliz tilida oila a'zolari oldidan egalik so'zi SHART.
Otangiz haqida gap ayting: My father is ...
Ingliz tilida ayting: Uning ismi Karim (erkak).
Do'stingiz (erkak) haqida ayting: His name is ...
Onangiz haqida gap ayting: My mother is ...
Ingliz tilida ayting: Uning ismi Malika (ayol).
Do'stingiz (qiz) haqida ayting: Her name is ...
'Brother' = erkak bola, 'Sister' = ayol bola. Farq bor!
'Brother' = أخ ذكر، 'Sister' = أخت أنثى. هناك فرق!
Ingliz tilida so'rang: Sizning akangiz shu yerda-mi?
⚠️ Savol uchun 'IS' birinchi! 'IS your brother here?' to'g'ri.
⚠️ في السؤال 'IS' أولاً! الصحيح 'IS your brother here?'.
Akangiz yoki ukangiz bormi? My brother is ...
Ingliz tilida ayting: Mening singlim shu yerda.
Opangiz yoki singlingiz bormi? My sister is ...
